column4: Any one got any recommendations on Beagle and other similar desktop search tools ?
in terms of search tools for the desktop, what are the top tools ??
I want search integration similar to OS X spotlight ?
and I want my chocolate cake
yes, use one of those tools along with the deskbar applet
which of the 2 do u use ?
yes, there is a plugin.  But it was buggy (crashed when you login).  I'm not sure if they have fixed it.
still busy indexing but it is quick
libdeskbar-tracker if you want to try it.  I know the fix was committed somewhere but I'm not sure if it's gotten into ubuntu
